options.content:
- [Error logs for FRS for the last 2 hours can be found in Kibana](http://logging-kibana.sharechat.internal:5601/app/discover#/view/81f965c0-30c5-11ee-a745-1f35ebd9f10f?_g=(filters%3A!()%2CrefreshInterval%3A(pause%3A!t%2Cvalue%3A0)%2Ctime%3A(from%3Anow-2h%2Fh%2Cto%3Anow))
- ShareChat Production VPN required.
- Only errors logged by the offical SC tracer client logger are shown in Kibana. Teltech logger etc., are not collected you need to check pod logs for those.
- Pod logs can be accessed from K9s, Lens, or Kubectl. Grepping in logs is easy via Kubectl:
   - `kubectl logs feed-relevance-service-canary-57d8ccb898-57b2q -n feed-relevance-service  | grep "panic"`

alert.message:
feed-relevance-service 50p is beyond the desired limits.
@ds-sc-feed-devs
alert.name: P50 Latency alert

alert.message:
feed-relevance-service 95p is beyond the desired limits.
@ds-sc-feed-devs
alert.name: P95 Latency Alert

alert.message:
Rate of Pod Restarts in feed-relevance-service is higher than expected
@ds-sc-feed-devs
alert.name: Pod Restarts Alert

panels.description: Rate of count of panics caught by middleware
panels.title: Panics Count Rate

panels.description: Rate of count of panics caught by middleware
panels.title: Pod Un-availability

panels.description: Rate of count of panics caught by middleware
panels.title: Pod Availability

targets.expr: sum(rate(posts_in_final_response{service_prometheus_track="${service_prom_track}", route=~"[[Path]]",kubernetes_pod_name=~"feed-relevance-service-${language}.*"})) by (service_prometheus_track, route) / on(route) group_left sum(rate(http_requests_total{service_prometheus_track="${service_prom_track}", route=~"[[Path]]",kubernetes_pod_name=~"feed-relevance-service-${language}.*"})) by (service_prometheus_track, route)

panels.title: Number of Posts In Final Response Per Request ${language}

targets.expr:
(
  (sum(envoy::cluster_upstream_rq_irate_2m{envoy_response_code!~"[4-5].*",envoy_cluster_name=~"feed-relevance-service.*"}) or vector(0)) 
  + 
  (sum(nginx_ingress::controller_requests_rate_2m{ingress="feed-relevance-service",status!~"[4-5].*"}) or vector(0))
) 
/ 
(
  (sum(envoy::cluster_upstream_rq_irate_2m{envoy_cluster_name=~"feed-relevance-service.*"}) or vector(0)) 
  + 
  (sum(nginx_ingress::controller_requests_rate_2m{ingress="feed-relevance-service"}) or vector(1))
)

alert.message:
Throughput of feed-relevance-service is lower than expected. Please check!!
@ds-sc-feed-devs
alert.name: QPS Alert

panels.description: % of requests being served without fallback
panels.title: Requests without fallback posts (SLI)

panels.title: % Requests served via Fallback

panels.description: Rate of failures/total requests made via hystrix in given interval
panels.title: Hystrix Fallback Rate % by Caller

panels.description: Total count of hystrix call fallbacks
panels.title: Hystrix Fallback Rate Count

panels.description: Rate of failures/total requests made via hystrix in given interval
panels.title: Hystrix Fallback Rate % by variant

metricQuery.query:
fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores'
| filter (resource.namespace_name == 'feed-relevance-service')
| group_by 1m, [value_request_cores_mean: mean(value.request_cores)]
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_request_cores_mean_aggregate: aggregate(value_request_cores_mean)]

timeSeriesQuery.query:
fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/cpu/request_cores'
| filter (resource.namespace_name == 'feed-relevance-service')
| group_by 1m, [value_request_cores_mean: mean(value.request_cores)]
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_request_cores_mean_aggregate: aggregate(value_request_cores_mean)]

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/cpu/core_usage_time'
| filter (resource.namespace_name == 'feed-relevance-service')
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_core_usage_time_aggregate: aggregate(value.core_usage_time)]

metricQuery.query:
fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/memory/request_bytes'
| filter (resource.namespace_name == 'feed-relevance-service')
| group_by 1m, [value_request_bytes_mean: mean(value.request_bytes)]
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_request_bytes_mean_aggregate: aggregate(value_request_bytes_mean)]

fetch k8s_container
| metric 'kubernetes.io/container/memory/used_bytes'
| filter (resource.namespace_name == 'feed-relevance-service')
| group_by 1m, [value_used_bytes_mean: mean(value.used_bytes)]
| align rate(1m)
| every 1m
| group_by [],
    [value_used_bytes_mean_aggregate: aggregate(value_used_bytes_mean)]

list.label: Language
list.name: language
list.query: hindi, tamil, telugu, kannada, malayalam, gujarati, marathi, bengali, odia, punjabi, assamese, bhojpuri, haryanvi, rajasthani, urdu
